game.title: Getting Over It
game.description: Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy is a punishing climbing game where you control a man in a pot using only a sledgehammer. The game tests your patience and skill as you navigate treacherous terrain, with the constant risk of falling and losing progress.

specifications.languages: English, 繁體中文, 한국어, 日本語, Русский

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
